version_description:
- Introducing a unique Force Touch game mechanic - make those gifts fly faster!
- Feel the power of Force Touch with subtle vibrations of Haptic Feedback.
- Did you see those extra vehicles in Palti's workshop yet? Well, now you can earn access to them quicker!
- Helping Santa can be a challenging task. We've added small in-game guides to help you on your way up.
- You've been good at filling all those empty balconies so we've made sure you will receive plenty of "special gifts" from now on.
- We've made our snowmen and Christmas trees come to life!
- Welcome, our Russian friends. We've localized our game into Russian language just for you!
- Performance optimizations.
- Minor fixes.

- Introducing a unique Force Touch game mechanic - make those gifts fly faster!
- Feel the power of Force Touch with subtle vibrations of Haptic Feedback.
- Did you see those extra vehicles in Palti's workshop yet? Well, now you can earn access to them quicker!
- Helping Santa can be a challenging task. We've added small in-game guides to help you on your way up.
- You've been good at filling all those empty balconies so we've made sure you will receive plenty of "special gifts" from now on.
- We've made our snowmen and Christmas trees come to life!
- Welcome, our Russian friends. We've localized our game into Russian language just for you!
- Performance optimizations.
- Minor fixes.

We made Moonlight Express look smooth on iPhone X. In addition, we made some minor adjustments and improvements to the gameplay.

Enjoy!

Enjoy!
